text:
Hello... I am new to this slack, hope this is the right place to expose my questions.
I need to  GET/PUT/POST  a custom object from our backend written in PHP. I have look for a way to do it with the PHP client library, but I can not find a way to do it. I also need to create the association with contact and this new customObject.
Is theres a way to interact with Custom Objects with this client library ?
As Custom objects are new concepts in HubSpot, maybe this feature will come soon in this client library ?

you didn’t link the library for someone to reference so we won’t be able to determine that.

custom objects are fairly new, so they might not be in libraries yet. You might need to extend it or write your own.

you might want to look for a specific library that does do custom objects (may not be php specific)
This is the channel you might be looking for (<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C2YHAHB6K>)
Is there a recommenced way of setting up two themes that share some code?
